column4: why do I get 0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded. when I do apt-get upgrade, as for example linux-image-server has an updated version, (dapper-security) and apt upgrade doesnt automatically show me that?
did you do  apt-get update    recently?
obviously, else policy wouldnt show me the updates
inetutils-inetd btw
ok  so i install  that   and that will get me a running inetd?
I'd recommend xinetd
ok i will try xinetd
help.ubuntu.com -> Servers
inetd is netkit-inetd apparently
xinetd is supposed to be "next-generation" but I am no expert, check /etc/inetd.conf
yes i saw that from apt-cache show   looked like  xinetd was the new things    but i had just installed talk and talkd   and they had set up  /etc/inetd for talk   so i played it safe
unix philosophy :)
try ping -b to your broadcast address
ok
never tried talk, is it any good?
it is primitive    i just figured it is so simple it would be easy to set up
like wall
it does interrupt your work
nice, I will try it, I like the concept
yeah I used to do screen multisessions for that
no not really, I mean to implement, it can be done easily
